product.title: Amber Wood Ps Wall Panel
product.description:
Wood-Effect Plastic Coating Panels

Izodekor's wood-effect plastic coating panels provide your interior spaces with the authentic look and feel of natural wood, delivering elegance and Scandinavian-inspired brightness without the typical wood-related issues.

These ready-to-install panels offer complete slats, enabling endless creative combinations customized to your preferences.

Specification Details
Length 290 cm
Width 12 cm
Thickness 2 cm
Material 100% recyclable plastic coating
Finish Realistic wood effect

Product Features:

  • ♻️ 100% recyclable, eco-friendly, conserves forest resources

  • 🌊 Water and rot-resistant, proven durability even in salt water

  • 🌡️ Weatherproof: withstands temperatures from -40°C to 60°C

  • 🐜 Resistant to insects and mould

  • 🚫 Maintenance-free: no paint, no glue, low upkeep

  • 🦶 Barefoot-friendly, non-slip, crack and warp-resistant

  • 🎨 Available in multiple colours

  • 🧹 Easy to install and maintain

Transform your interiors effortlessly with Izodekor's sustainable, durable, and beautifully designed wood-effect panels.

Return Policy:

  • 14-day return period

  • £25 fixed-price return shipping

product.title: Ancient Traces K-03 3D Faux Mixed Wall Panels
product.description:
***If you're looking for a different wallcovering solution than painting,changing or applying wallpaper;
3D Wall Panels are the place to go!!!
3D Wall Panels can be easily installed without the need for a craftsman and guarantee a dust-free and clean installation. Needs no renovation,it has a long life.

    TITLE INFORMATION WHY STYROFOAM PANELS
    Material Eps DIY Products
    Price By Board Hardly flammable (B1)
    m2 / piece 0.5 m2 (5.38 sq. ft) Easy To Install
    Height 50 cm (1.64 ft) Thermal Insulations
    Width 100 cm (3.28 ft) Resistant & Strong
    Thick 2 cm (0.07 ft) Real 3D Brick Effect

     
    Cost savings

    It does not cause problems such as dirt, dust or stains caused by natural stone or wallpaper and saves your budget such costs.it can be used for many years with its recyclable function and does not need to be replaced over time.

    How many boards do you need ?

    One board size is 50*100 cm.

    For example, if your wall is 3.30 cm ( width ) x 2.60 cm ( length ) = 8.58 m2, almost 9 m2, you need to buy 9 m2 x 2 = 18 boards. (Only in case of cutting mistakes etc. it is recommended to take more than 1 or 2 boards for cases).

    Important note

    Due to the design and printing techniques of the products in our shop, colours may vary on average by 10% from the original products. There may be colour differences between the same models ordered at different times.

    Use for exterior facades

    Izodekor 3D wall panels can also be used for exterior applications.
    It insulates from moisture, cold and heat and does not deform over time.
    It is waterproof and also offers sound protection.
    For bonding in the exterior you need a
    cement-based exterior wall styrofoam adhesive. After gluing, you need to paint the panels with a water-based varnish. The reason you need to use varnish is to prevent fading from sunlight over time.

product.title: Arctic Breeze Marble Look Wallpanels
product.description:
Product information "Arctic Breeze wall panel/wall tile"

Arctic Breeze wall panel is a representation of a natural stone look wall tile with a light decor. It creates an elegant look on your walls that becomes a real eye-catcher. The Arctic Breeze  variety is particularly popular as a kitchen splashback or in the bathroom.

 

Aesthetic Charm Of Natural Marble With Its Unique Patterns

  • PVC large marble is an interior cladding material that elegantly mimics the striking beauty of natural marble while offering a durable, cost-effective, and environmentally friendly alternative.
  • This material revives the aesthetic charm of natural marble with its unique patterns, color tones, and veins, while also providing practical advantages.
  • Thanks to the durability of PVC, it provides a long-lasting covering for many years.
  • Additionally, it is easy to install due to its lighter weight and offers various design options, adding a distinctive aesthetic to spaces.
  • PVC large marble is also easy to maintain, ensuring a long-lasting wall covering with regular cleaning. With both aesthetic and practical advantages, PVC large marble is an appealing and functional choice for indoor spaces.
  • The product measures 244x122 cm and has a thickness of 3 mm. With these features, it offers a wide range of applications, from homes to offices, stores to commercial spaces.


Delivered specifically to your address and satisfied customers🏠✔️

🚚Delivery time: From CM20 2DR £59.90 and approx. 3-4 weeks

 

Properties Description
Product Type Wall tile/panel in marble and granite look
Sales Volume One panel with 2.98 m²
Dimensions (L x W) 244 cm x 122 cm
Thickness 3 mm
Material Acrylic-polyester mixture
Weight 12 kg
Area of Use Indoors
Surface Marble and granite look, glossy
Sales Units per m² Approximately 0,3 panels
Color Refer to product photo (deviation possible from batch to batch)
Substrate On all adherent smooth, even, clean substrates (plaster, gypsum, wallpaper, wood, tile, other)
Installation Accessories Required Cutter knife/carpet knife, jigsaw with fine saw blade, circular saw, Flex, cartridge press, adhesive, tape measure, pencil, spirit level, notched spatula/spatula
Attachment Adhesive for non-absorbent substrates (tile, etc.): Assembly adhesive (Izopiyer adhesive); Adhesive for absorbent substrates (plaster, sheetrock, etc.): Rigid foam adhesive
Special Features Can be applied directly to tiles, especially preferred as a backsplash in the kitchen or bathroom, ideal alternative to tiles, easy to apply


   Montage
   Our panels are attached with mounting adhesive, depending on the surface. The panels are cut to size with a cutting knife, circular saw or flex. With the marble-looking panel, you can give your home a noble appearance that will amaze both your family and friends. Don't hesitate to recommend us to others.


   Areas of application

  • Private rooms: 

Living room, kitchen (kitchen mirror), bedrooms, corridors, bathrooms, cellars.

  • Commercial:

Shop fitting, trade fair construction, counters, business premises (hairdressers, retail, hotel, restaurants, snack bars, gyms, cafes, bars, etc.), others

product.title: Argento Acoustic Wood Wall Panels
product.description:
Acoustic Wood Wall Panels

Transform your space with our elegant wood veneered acoustic wall panels. Designed for both residential and commercial interiors, these panels enhance any décor, whether installed as a complete wall or a striking feature wall.

Our acoustic wall panels combine aesthetics, durability, and sustainability, making them the ideal choice for modern interiors. They offer easy installation, minimal maintenance, and effortless cleaning. Their flexible application allows for creative design freedom, and they significantly improve room acoustics and insulation.

Specification Details
Panel Length 240 cm or 300 cm
Panel Width 60 cm
Panel Depth 2.1 cm
Panel Weight 10 kg or 13 kg
Slat Width 2.7 cm
Slat Depth 1.2 cm

Key Features:

  • 🚚 Delivery: Ships next day, arrives within approximately 1 week

  • 🌿 Natural aesthetic appearance

  • 🛠️ Quick and easy installation

  • 💪 High durability and strength

  • 🔊 Excellent sound insulation

  • ♻️ Environmentally friendly and sustainable

  • 🧹 Low maintenance, easy cleaning

  • 📌 Suitable for multiple surface types

  • 🔥 Felt backing for enhanced heat and sound insulation

  • 🎨 Allows creative flexibility in interior design

  • 🌡️ Promotes a healthy indoor climate

  • Cutting blades (minimal tools required)

  • 14-day return period

  • £25 fixed-price return shipping

product.title: Autumn Grey Natural Stone Wall Panels
product.description:
Self-adhesive fine natural stone, developed so that you can design your own authentic rooms.

With our "DIY" product, which has been developed for our users with a new generation of do-it-yourself culture, you can adapt your own interpretation to your wall by creating applications in your own style.

 The self-adhesive natural stone slabs are easy to attach to walls, as there is an adhesive layer on the back.

  • The measure of panels are 15x60cm and are 4mm thick.
  • The front is made of real natural stone.
  • A self-adhesive tape is available on the back.
  • No mortar required, just glue.
  • The surface must be flat and dust-free.
  • 100% natural look.
  • Not suitable for damp areas.
  • Suitable for indoor use
  • The prices are per piece
  • Cut to size or with a grinder or with a pair of tin snips.

To treat.

To enjoy the self-adhesive natural stone slabs for longer, we recommend impregnating them.

    Bilecik Beige wall panel is a representation of a natural stone look wall tile with a light decor. It creates an elegant look on your walls that becomes a real eye-catcher. The Bilecik Beige variety is particularly popular as a kitchen splashback or in the bathroom.

Product information "Calacada wall panel/wall tile"

  Calacada wall panel is a representation of a natural stone look wall tile with a light decor. It creates an elegant look on your walls that becomes a real eye-catcher. The Calacada  variety is particularly popular as a kitchen splashback or in the bathroom.

 

Aesthetic Charm Of Natural Marble With Its Unique Patterns

  • PVC large marble is an interior cladding material that elegantly mimics the striking beauty of natural marble while offering a durable, cost-effective, and environmentally friendly alternative.
  • This material revives the aesthetic charm of natural marble with its unique patterns, color tones, and veins, while also providing practical advantages.
  • Thanks to the durability of PVC, it provides a long-lasting covering for many years.
  • Additionally, it is easy to install due to its lighter weight and offers various design options, adding a distinctive aesthetic to spaces.
  • PVC large marble is also easy to maintain, ensuring a long-lasting wall covering with regular cleaning. With both aesthetic and practical advantages, PVC large marble is an appealing and functional choice for indoor spaces.
  • The product measures 244x122 cm and has a thickness of 3 mm. With these features, it offers a wide range of applications, from homes to offices, stores to commercial spaces.


Delivered specifically to your address and satisfied customers🏠✔️

product.title: Cloudy Wood AP-21 3D Acoustic Wall Panels
product.description:
***If you're looking for a different wallcovering solution than painting,changing or applying wallpaper;
3D Wall Panels are the place to go!!!
3D Wall Panels can be easily installed without the need for a craftsman and guarantee a dust-free and clean installation. Needs no renovation,it has a long life.

    TITLE INFORMATION WHY STYROFOAM PANELS
    Material Eps DIY Products
    Price By Board Hardly flammable (B1)
    m2 / piece 0.5 m2 (5.38 sq. ft) Easy To Install
    Height 50 cm (1.64 ft) Thermal Insulations
    Width 100 cm (3.28 ft) Resistant & Strong
    Thick 2 cm (0.07 ft) Real 3D Brick Effect

     
    Cost savings

    It does not cause problems such as dirt, dust or stains caused by natural stone or wallpaper and saves your budget such costs.it can be used for many years with its recyclable function and does not need to be replaced over time.

    How many boards do you need ?

    One board size is 50*100 cm.

    For example, if your wall is 3.30 cm ( width ) x 2.60 cm ( length ) = 8.58 m2, almost 9 m2, you need to buy 9 m2 x 2 = 18 boards. (Only in case of cutting mistakes etc. it is recommended to take more than 1 or 2 boards for cases).



    Important note

    Due to the design and printing techniques of the products in our shop, colours may vary on average by 10% from the original products. There may be colour differences between the same models ordered at different times.

    Use for exterior facades

    Izodekor 3D wall panels can also be used for exterior applications.
    It insulates from moisture, cold and heat and does not deform over time.
    It is waterproof and also offers sound protection.
    For bonding in the exterior you need a
    cement-based exterior wall styrofoam adhesive. After gluing, you need to paint the panels with a water-based varnish. The reason you need to use varnish is to prevent fading from sunlight over time.

Acoustic Wood Wall Panels

Transform your space with our elegant wood veneered acoustic wall panels. Designed for both residential and commercial interiors, these panels enhance any décor, whether installed as a complete wall or a striking feature wall.

Our acoustic wall panels combine aesthetics, durability, and sustainability, making them the ideal choice for modern interiors. They offer easy installation, minimal maintenance, and effortless cleaning. Their flexible application allows for creative design freedom, and they significantly improve room acoustics and insulation.

    Thick 2 cm (0.07 ft) Real 3D Brick Effect

     
    Cost savings

    It does not cause problems such as dirt, dust or stains caused by natural stone or wallpaper and saves your budget such costs.it can be used for many years with its recyclable function and does not need to be replaced over time.

    How many boards do you need ?

    One board size is 50*100 cm.

    For example, if your wall is 3.30 cm ( width ) x 2.60 cm ( length ) = 8.58 m2, almost 9 m2, you need to buy 9 m2 x 2 = 18 boards. (Only in case of cutting mistakes etc. it is recommended to take more than 1 or 2 boards for cases).

    Important note

    Due to the design and printing techniques of the products in our shop, colours may vary on average by 10% from the original products. There may be colour differences between the same models ordered at different times.

    Use for exterior facades

    Izodekor 3D wall panels can also be used for exterior applications.
    It insulates from moisture, cold and heat and does not deform over time.
    It is waterproof and also offers sound protection.
    For bonding in the exterior you need a
    cement-based exterior wall styrofoam adhesive. After gluing, you need to paint the panels with a water-based varnish. The reason you need to use varnish is to prevent fading from sunlight over time.

product.description:
Product information "Wall panel/wall tile Iron Hand"

    Iron Hand wall panel is a representation of a natural stone look wall tile with a light decor. It creates an elegant look on your walls that becomes a real eye-catcher. The Iron Hand variety is particularly popular as a kitchen splashback or in the bathroom.

Aesthetic Charm Of Natural Marble With Its Unique Patterns

  • PVC large marble is an interior cladding material that elegantly mimics the striking beauty of natural marble while offering a durable, cost-effective, and environmentally friendly alternative.
  • This material revives the aesthetic charm of natural marble with its unique patterns, color tones, and veins, while also providing practical advantages.
  • Thanks to the durability of PVC, it provides a long-lasting covering for many years.
  • Additionally, it is easy to install due to its lighter weight and offers various design options, adding a distinctive aesthetic to spaces.
  • PVC large marble is also easy to maintain, ensuring a long-lasting wall covering with regular cleaning. With both aesthetic and practical advantages, PVC large marble is an appealing and functional choice for indoor spaces.
  • The product measures 120 cm x 60 cm and has a thickness of 3 mm. With these features, it offers a wide range of applications, from homes to offices, stores to commercial spaces.

product.title: Light Wood AP-01 3D Acoustic Wall Panels
product.description:
***If you're looking for a different wallcovering solution than painting,changing or applying wallpaper;
3D Wall Panels are the place to go!!!
3D Wall Panels can be easily installed without the need for a craftsman and guarantee a dust-free and clean installation. Needs no renovation,it has a long life.

    TITLE INFORMATION WHY STYROFOAM PANELS
    Material Eps DIY Products
    Price By Board Hardly flammable (B1)
    m2 / piece 0.5 m2 (5.38 sq. ft) Easy To Install
    Height 50 cm (1.64 ft) Thermal Insulations
    Width 100 cm (3.28 ft) Resistant & Strong
    Thick 2 cm (0.07 ft) Real 3D Brick Effect

     
    Cost savings

    It does not cause problems such as dirt, dust or stains caused by natural stone or wallpaper and saves your budget such costs.it can be used for many years with its recyclable function and does not need to be replaced over time.

    How many boards do you need ?

    One board size is 50*100 cm.

    For example, if your wall is 3.30 cm ( width ) x 2.60 cm ( length ) = 8.58 m2, almost 9 m2, you need to buy 9 m2 x 2 = 18 boards. (Only in case of cutting mistakes etc. it is recommended to take more than 1 or 2 boards for cases).



    Important note

    Due to the design and printing techniques of the products in our shop, colours may vary on average by 10% from the original products. There may be colour differences between the same models ordered at different times.

    Use for exterior facades

    Izodekor 3D wall panels can also be used for exterior applications.
    It insulates from moisture, cold and heat and does not deform over time.
    It is waterproof and also offers sound protection.
    For bonding in the exterior you need a
    cement-based exterior wall styrofoam adhesive. After gluing, you need to paint the panels with a water-based varnish. The reason you need to use varnish is to prevent fading from sunlight over time.

product.title: London Saphire Wall Panels
product.description:
Self-adhesive fine natural stone, developed so that you can design your own authentic rooms.

With our "DIY" product, which has been developed for our users with a new generation of do-it-yourself culture, you can adapt your own interpretation to your wall by creating applications in your own style.

 The self-adhesive natural stone slabs are easy to attach to walls, as there is an adhesive layer on the back.

  • The measure of panels are 15x60cm and are 4mm thick.
  • The front is made of real natural stone.
  • A self-adhesive tape is available on the back.
  • No mortar required, just glue.
  • The surface must be flat and dust-free.
  • 100% natural look.
  • Not suitable for damp areas.
  • Suitable for indoor use
  • The prices are per piece
  • Cut to size or with a grinder or with a pair of tin snips.

To treat.

To enjoy the self-adhesive natural stone slabs for longer, we recommend impregnating them.

product.title: Outlet Black-White Marble Look Wallpanels (120x60cm)
product.description:
Welcome to Izodekor Outlet. Here we offer you super low prices on usable panels with little damage. Some of these panels are as good as new or have minor optical defects. But they are always original. A good chance to renovate your invisible but damaged walls.

Returns are not accepted for our outlet products.




Product information "Black-White wall panel/wall tile"

    The Black-White wall panel is a representation of a wall tile in natural stone look with light decor. It creates an elegant look on your walls that becomes a real eye-catcher. The Black-White  variety is particularly popular as a kitchen splashback or in the bathroom.

     Our panels are attached with hard foam adhesive or mounting adhesive, depending on the surface. Both adhesives are also available from us. The panels are cut to size with a cutter knife, circular saw or flex. With Black-White, you give your home a noble look that will be the envy of both family and friends. Feel free to recommend us to others.

Properties Description
Product Type Wall tile/panel in marble and granite look
Sales Volume One panel with 0.72 m²
Dimensions (L x W) 120 cm x 60 cm
Thickness 3 mm
Material Acrylic-polyester mixture
Weight 3 kg
Area of Use Indoors
Surface Marble and granite look, glossy
Sales Units per m² Approximately 1.5 panels
Color Refer to product photo (deviation possible from batch to batch)
Substrate On all adherent smooth, even, clean substrates (plaster, gypsum, wallpaper, wood, tile, other)
Installation Accessories Required Cutter knife/carpet knife, jigsaw with fine saw blade, circular saw, Flex, cartridge press, adhesive, tape measure, pencil, spirit level, notched spatula/spatula
Attachment Adhesive for non-absorbent substrates (tile, etc.): Assembly adhesive (Izopiyer adhesive); Adhesive for absorbent substrates (plaster, sheetrock, etc.): Rigid foam adhesive
Special Features Can be applied directly to tiles, especially preferred as a backsplash in the kitchen or bathroom, ideal alternative to tiles, easy to apply


Areas of application

  • Private rooms: 

Living room, kitchen (kitchen mirror), bedrooms, corridors, bathrooms, cellars.

  • Commercial:

Shop fitting, trade fair construction, counters, business premises (hairdressers, retail, hotel, restaurants, snack bars, gyms, cafes, bars, etc.), others

Welcome to Izodekor Outlet. Here we offer you super low prices on usable panels with little damage. Some of these panels are as good as new or have minor optical defects. But they are always original. A good chance to renovate your invisible but damaged walls.

Returns are not accepted for our outlet products.

         ***IF YOU'RE LOOKING FOR A DIFFERENT WALLCOVERING SOLUTION THAN PAINTING,CHANGING OR APPLYING WALLPAPER;
3D WALL PANELS ARE THE PLACE TO GO!!!
3D WALL PANELS CAN BE EASILY INSTALLED WITHOUT THE NEED FOR A CRAFTSMAN AND GUARANTEE A DUST-FREE AND CLEAN INSTALLATION. NEEDS NO RENOVATION,IT HAS A LONG LIFE.

    TITLE INFORMATION WHY STYROFOAM PANELS
    Material Eps DIY Products
    Price By Board Hardly flammable (B1)
    m2 / piece 0.5 m2 (5.38 sq. ft) Easy To Install
    Height 50 cm (1.64 ft) Thermal Insulations
    Width 100 cm (3.28 ft) Resistant & Strong
    Thick 2 cm (0.07 ft) Real 3D Brick Effect

     
    Cost savings

    It does not cause problems such as dirt, dust or stains caused by natural stone or wallpaper and saves your budget such costs.it can be used for many years with its recyclable function and does not need to be replaced over time.

    How many boards do you need ?

    One board size is 50*100 cm.

    For example, if your wall is 3.30 cm ( width ) x 2.60 cm ( length ) = 8.58 m2, almost 9 m2, you need to buy 9 m2 x 2 = 18 boards. (Only in case of cutting mistakes etc. it is recommended to take more than 1 or 2 boards for cases).

    Important note

    Due to the design and printing techniques of the products in our shop, colours may vary on average by 10% from the original products. There may be colour differences between the same models ordered at different times.

    Use for exterior facades

    Izodekor 3D wall panels can also be used for exterior applications.
    It insulates from moisture, cold and heat and does not deform over time.
    It is waterproof and also offers sound protection.
    For bonding in the exterior you need a
    cement-based exterior wall styrofoam adhesive. After gluing, you need to paint the panels with a water-based varnish. The reason you need to use varnish is to prevent fading from sunlight over time.

product.title: Panda Strait Marble Look Wallpanels
product.description:
Product information "Wall panel/wall tile Panda Strait"

    Panda Strait wall panel is a representation of a natural stone look wall tile with a light decor. It creates an elegant look on your walls that becomes a real eye-catcher. The Panda Strait  variety is particularly popular as a kitchen splashback or in the bathroom.

 

Aesthetic Charm Of Natural Marble With Its Unique Patterns

  • PVC large marble is an interior cladding material that elegantly mimics the striking beauty of natural marble while offering a durable, cost-effective, and environmentally friendly alternative.
  • This material revives the aesthetic charm of natural marble with its unique patterns, color tones, and veins, while also providing practical advantages.
  • Thanks to the durability of PVC, it provides a long-lasting covering for many years.
  • Additionally, it is easy to install due to its lighter weight and offers various design options, adding a distinctive aesthetic to spaces.
  • PVC large marble is also easy to maintain, ensuring a long-lasting wall covering with regular cleaning. With both aesthetic and practical advantages, PVC large marble is an appealing and functional choice for indoor spaces.
  • The product measures 244x122 cm and has a thickness of 3 mm. With these features, it offers a wide range of applications, from homes to offices, stores to commercial spaces.


Delivered specifically to your address and satisfied customers🏠✔️

🚚Delivery time: From CM20 2DR £59.90 and approx. 3-4 weeks

 

Properties Description
Product Type Wall tile/panel in marble and granite look
Sales Volume One panel with 2.98 m²
Dimensions (L x W) 244 cm x 122 cm
Thickness 3 mm
Material Acrylic-polyester mixture
Weight 12 kg
Area of Use Indoors
Surface Marble and granite look, glossy
Sales Units per m² Approximately 0,3 panels
Color Refer to product photo (deviation possible from batch to batch)
Substrate On all adherent smooth, even, clean substrates (plaster, gypsum, wallpaper, wood, tile, other)
Installation Accessories Required Cutter knife/carpet knife, jigsaw with fine saw blade, circular saw, Flex, cartridge press, adhesive, tape measure, pencil, spirit level, notched spatula/spatula
Attachment Adhesive for non-absorbent substrates (tile, etc.): Assembly adhesive (Izopiyer adhesive); Adhesive for absorbent substrates (plaster, sheetrock, etc.): Rigid foam adhesive
Special Features Can be applied directly to tiles, especially preferred as a backsplash in the kitchen or bathroom, ideal alternative to tiles, easy to apply


   Montage
   Our panels are attached with mounting adhesive, depending on the surface. The panels are cut to size with a cutting knife, circular saw or flex. With the marble-looking panel, you can give your home a noble appearance that will amaze both your family and friends. Don't hesitate to recommend us to others.


   Areas of application

  • Private rooms: 

Living room, kitchen (kitchen mirror), bedrooms, corridors, bathrooms, cellars.

  • Commercial:

Shop fitting, trade fair construction, counters, business premises (hairdressers, retail, hotel, restaurants, snack bars, gyms, cafes, bars, etc.), others

product.title: Pear Wood Ps Wall Panel
product.description:
Wood-Effect Plastic Coating Panels

Izodekor's wood-effect plastic coating panels provide your interior spaces with the authentic look and feel of natural wood, delivering elegance and Scandinavian-inspired brightness without the typical wood-related issues.

These ready-to-install panels offer complete slats, enabling endless creative combinations customized to your preferences.

Specification Details
Length 290 cm
Width 12 cm
Thickness 2 cm
Material 100% recyclable plastic coating
Finish Realistic wood effect

Product Features:

  • ♻️ 100% recyclable, eco-friendly, conserves forest resources

  • 🌊 Water and rot-resistant, proven durability even in salt water

  • 🌡️ Weatherproof: withstands temperatures from -40°C to 60°C

  • 🐜 Resistant to insects and mould

  • 🚫 Maintenance-free: no paint, no glue, low upkeep

  • 🦶 Barefoot-friendly, non-slip, crack and warp-resistant

  • 🎨 Available in multiple colours

  • 🧹 Easy to install and maintain

Transform your interiors effortlessly with Izodekor's sustainable, durable, and beautifully designed wood-effect panels.

Return Policy:

  • 14-day return period

  • £25 fixed-price return shipping

product.title: Pvc L Corner Profile 1000x30x30mm
product.description:
White PVC angle L profile corner profile is a durable and versatile building material. It is ideal for indoor and outdoor use and is often favoured for providing an aesthetic finish at corners.

Note: Corners are only suitable for marble panels. 

Not compatible with 3D wall panels such as Lycia-brick effect.


Specifications:

Material: PVC (Polyvinyl Chloride)
Colour: White
Dimensions: 1000x30x30mm
Advantages

Durable and long-lasting material
Lightweight and easy to process
Suitable for long-term use due to water and moisture resistance
Provides an aesthetic appearance and offers a smooth finish in corners
Areas of Use:

Wall, ceiling or corner coverings
Construction and renovation projects
Furniture manufacturing
Decoration and interior design
White PVC angle L profile corner profile is the perfect option to make work easier and provide an aesthetic appearance in your projects with its durability and versatile use.

product.title: Roma Stone Adhesive Natural Stone Wall Panels
product.description:
Self-adhesive fine natural stone, developed so that you can design your own authentic rooms.

With our "DIY" product, which has been developed for our users with a new generation of do-it-yourself culture, you can adapt your own interpretation to your wall by creating applications in your own style.

 The self-adhesive natural stone slabs are easy to attach to walls, as there is an adhesive layer on the back.

  • The measure of panels are 15x60cm and are 4mm thick.
  • The front is made of real natural stone.
  • A self-adhesive tape is available on the back.
  • No mortar required, just glue.
  • The surface must be flat and dust-free.
  • 100% natural look.
  • Not suitable for damp areas.
  • Suitable for indoor use
  • The prices are per piece
  • Cut to size or with a grinder or with a pair of tin snips.

To treat.

To enjoy the self-adhesive natural stone slabs for longer, we recommend impregnating them.

product.title: Ruler
product.description:
PATTERN TRACKING:
Pay attention to the direction of the wall panel while applying our products, the panel you add should follow the pattern.
HOW MANY SILICONES DO YOU NEED:
1 piece of silicone is enough to stick approximately 3-4 wall panels.
WALL CALCULATION:
You can calculate m2 by multiplying the width and height of your wall.
PRODUCT CUTTING:
Cut our panels from the back (from the styrofoam area).

product.title: Sample Product 25x25 cm Ancient Traces K-03 3D Faux Mixed Wall Panels
product.description:
Is it Deceptive between models and colors? We have prepared a sample product order section so that you can choose the most suitable model for you!

* The sample panel size is 25x25 cm.

* One panel size is 50x100 cm.

product.title: Sandsturm L-1924 3D Decorative Wall Panels
product.description:
***If you're looking for a different wallcovering solution than painting,changing or applying wallpaper;
3D Wall Panels are the place to go!!!
3D Wall Panels can be easily installed without the need for a craftsman and guarantee a dust-free and clean installation. Needs no renovation,it has a long life.

    TITLE INFORMATION WHY STYROFOAM PANELS
    Material Eps DIY Products
    Price By Board Hardly flammable (B1)
    m2 / piece 0.5 m2 (5.38 sq. ft) Easy To Install
    Height 50 cm (1.64 ft) Thermal Insulations
    Width 100 cm (3.28 ft) Resistant & Strong
    Thick 2 cm (0.07 ft) Real 3D Brick Effect

     
    Cost savings

    It does not cause problems such as dirt, dust or stains caused by natural stone or wallpaper and saves your budget such costs.it can be used for many years with its recyclable function and does not need to be replaced over time.

    How many boards do you need ?

    One board size is 50*100 cm.

    For example, if your wall is 3.30 cm ( width ) x 2.60 cm ( length ) = 8.58 m2, almost 9 m2, you need to buy 9 m2 x 2 = 18 boards. (Only in case of cutting mistakes etc. it is recommended to take more than 1 or 2 boards for cases).

    Important note

    Due to the design and printing techniques of the products in our shop, colours may vary on average by 10% from the original products. There may be colour differences between the same models ordered at different times.

    Use for exterior facades

    Izodekor 3D wall panels can also be used for exterior applications.
    It insulates from moisture, cold and heat and does not deform over time.
    It is waterproof and also offers sound protection.
    For bonding in the exterior you need a
    cement-based exterior wall styrofoam adhesive. After gluing, you need to paint the panels with a water-based varnish. The reason you need to use varnish is to prevent fading from sunlight over time.

product.title: Silicone Gun
product.description:
PATTERN TRACKING:
Pay attention to the direction of the wall panel while applying our products, the panel you add should follow the pattern.
HOW MANY SILICONES DO YOU NEED:
1 piece of silicone is enough to stick approximately 3-4 wall panels.
WALL CALCULATION:
You can calculate m2 by multiplying the width and height of your wall.
PRODUCT CUTTING:
Cut our panels from the back (from the styrofoam area).

product.title: Star Marble Look Wallpanels
product.description:
Product information "Star Marble wall panel/wall tile"

    Ice Berg Grey wall panel is a representation of a natural stone look wall tile with a light decor. It creates an elegant look on your walls that becomes a real eye-catcher. TheStar Marble variety is particularly popular as a kitchen splashback or in the bathroom.

Aesthetic Charm Of Natural Marble With Its Unique Patterns

  • PVC large marble is an interior cladding material that elegantly mimics the striking beauty of natural marble while offering a durable, cost-effective, and environmentally friendly alternative.
  • This material revives the aesthetic charm of natural marble with its unique patterns, color tones, and veins, while also providing practical advantages.
  • Thanks to the durability of PVC, it provides a long-lasting covering for many years.
  • Additionally, it is easy to install due to its lighter weight and offers various design options, adding a distinctive aesthetic to spaces.
  • PVC large marble is also easy to maintain, ensuring a long-lasting wall covering with regular cleaning. With both aesthetic and practical advantages, PVC large marble is an appealing and functional choice for indoor spaces.
  • The product measures 120 cm x 60 cm and has a thickness of 3 mm. With these features, it offers a wide range of applications, from homes to offices, stores to commercial spaces.


Properties Description
Product Type Wall tile/panel in marble and granite look
Sales Volume One panel with 0.72 m²
Dimensions (L x W) 120 cm x 60 cm
Thickness 3 mm
Material Acrylic-polyester mixture
Weight 3 kg
Area of Use Indoors
Surface Marble and granite look, glossy
Sales Units per m² Approximately 1.5 panels
Color Refer to product photo (deviation possible from batch to batch)
Substrate On all adherent smooth, even, clean substrates (plaster, gypsum, wallpaper, wood, tile, other)
Installation Accessories Required Cutter knife/carpet knife, jigsaw with fine saw blade, circular saw, Flex, cartridge press, adhesive, tape measure, pencil, spirit level, notched spatula/spatula
Attachment Adhesive for non-absorbent substrates (tile, etc.): Assembly adhesive (Izopiyer adhesive); Adhesive for absorbent substrates (plaster, sheetrock, etc.): Rigid foam adhesive
Special Features Can be applied directly to tiles, especially preferred as a backsplash in the kitchen or bathroom, ideal alternative to tiles, easy to apply

 

Montage
   Our panels are attached with mounting adhesive, depending on the surface. The panels are cut to size with a cutting knife, circular saw or flex. With the marble-looking panel, you can give your home a noble appearance that will amaze both your family and friends. Don't hesitate to recommend us to others.


Areas of application

  • Private rooms: 

Living room, kitchen (kitchen mirror), bedrooms, corridors, bathrooms, cellars.

  • Commercial:

Shop fitting, trade fair construction, counters, business premises (hairdressers, retail, hotel, restaurants, snack bars, gyms, cafes, bars, etc.), others

product.title: Stone Bridge L-1902 Brick Wall Panels
product.description:
✨ IZODEKOR 3D Styrofoam Wall Panels ✨

Transform your space effortlessly! If you're looking for an alternative to traditional paint or wallpaper, IZODEKOR 3D Wall Panels are your ideal solution. Offering easy DIY installation, these panels guarantee a clean, dust-free process, requiring no craftsmen or extensive renovations. Durable, recyclable, and long-lasting, they redefine practicality and aesthetics.

📌 Technical Specifications:

Specification Information Why Choose Styrofoam Panels?
Material EPS (Expanded Polystyrene) DIY-Friendly Products
Price Per Board Hardly Flammable (Class B1)
Area per Board 0.5 m² (5.38 sq. ft) Quick & Easy Installation
Height 50 cm (1.64 ft) Excellent Thermal Insulation
Width 100 cm (3.28 ft) Durable, Resistant & Strong
Thickness 2 cm (0.07 ft) Realistic 3D Brick Effect

💰 Cost Savings & Sustainability

Forget the mess and high costs associated with traditional wallpaper or natural stone. IZODEKOR panels are dirt-resistant, recyclable, budget-friendly, and designed for long-term use without needing replacement.

📏 How Many Boards Do You Need?

Each board measures 50 x 100 cm.

Example:
Wall Size: 330 cm (width) x 260 cm (height)

  • Total area = 8.58 m² (approx. 9 m²)

  • Boards required: 9 m² x 2 = 18 boards
    (It is recommended to order 1-2 extra boards to account for cuts or installation adjustments.)

⚠️ Important Notes

Due to printing and manufacturing methods, product colours may vary by approximately 10%. Minor colour differences can occur between batches ordered at different times.

🏠 Exterior Application

IZODEKOR 3D Panels are also suitable for exterior façades:

  • ✔️ Waterproof and weather-resistant

  • ✔️ Insulates against moisture, heat, and cold

  • ✔️ Offers sound protection

  • ✔️ Does not deform or deteriorate over time

Exterior Installation Steps:

  • Use cement-based styrofoam adhesive specifically for exterior walls.

  • After installation, apply a water-based varnish to prevent UV-related colour fading.

Enhance your living spaces sustainably and stylishly with IZODEKOR 3D Styrofoam Panels!

product.title: White Grey L-1702 3D Decorative Wall Panels
product.description:
***If you're looking for a different wallcovering solution than painting,changing or applying wallpaper;
3D Wall Panels are the place to go!!!
3D Wall Panels can be easily installed without the need for a craftsman and guarantee a dust-free and clean installation. Needs no renovation,it has a long life.

    TITLE INFORMATION WHY STYROFOAM PANELS
    Material Eps DIY Products
    Price By Board Hardly flammable (B1)
    m2 / piece 0.5 m2 (5.38 sq. ft) Easy To Install
    Height 50 cm (1.64 ft) Thermal Insulations
    Width 100 cm (3.28 ft) Resistant & Strong
    Thick 2 cm (0.07 ft) Real 3D Brick Effect

     
    Cost savings

    It does not cause problems such as dirt, dust or stains caused by natural stone or wallpaper and saves your budget such costs.it can be used for many years with its recyclable function and does not need to be replaced over time.

    How many boards do you need ?

    One board size is 50*100 cm.

    For example, if your wall is 3.30 cm ( width ) x 2.60 cm ( length ) = 8.58 m2, almost 9 m2, you need to buy 9 m2 x 2 = 18 boards. (Only in case of cutting mistakes etc. it is recommended to take more than 1 or 2 boards for cases).

    Important note

    Due to the design and printing techniques of the products in our shop, colours may vary on average by 10% from the original products. There may be colour differences between the same models ordered at different times.

    Use for exterior facades

    Izodekor 3D wall panels can also be used for exterior applications.
    It insulates from moisture, cold and heat and does not deform over time.
    It is waterproof and also offers sound protection.
    For bonding in the exterior you need a
    cement-based exterior wall styrofoam adhesive. After gluing, you need to paint the panels with a water-based varnish. The reason you need to use varnish is to prevent fading from sunlight over time.
